channel.title: Lunar 508 button id's?
channel.description: well, i'm asking if anyone knows the button id's for lunar like the button id's for npc contact ect, if no one knows then answer me this how can i make a object say bank booth work, like a bank booth in moonclan/ lunar isle or make it so that when you click a npc (like the house from lunar diplomacy) and then it teleports you to say some set of co ords? just anyone of them will do, doesn't have to be all :D thanks everyone for the help

item.title: Lunar 508 button id's?
item.dc:creator: @cheeseblock cheeseblock
item.description:
@cheeseblock wrote:

well, i’m asking if anyone knows the button id’s for lunar like the button id’s for npc contact ect,
if no one knows then answer me this how can i make a object say bank booth work, like a bank booth in moonclan/ lunar isle
or make it so that when you click a npc (like the house from lunar diplomacy) and then it teleports you to say some set of co ords?
just anyone of them will do, doesn’t have to be all
thanks everyone for the help
